ygData.subject: Re: Revived Megatron --> Preds
ygData.msgSnippet: Endulging in that kiss... the part of her that had finally gotten use to the new form & ideal way of the Transformers... enjoyed this affection now. No longer

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Endulging in that kiss... the part of her that had finally gotten use to the 
new form & ideal way of the Transformers... enjoyed this affection now. No 
longer resenting the small organic part of her. 

As the kiss was broken, she grinned & nodded. "As you wish," she purred. 

Then gracefully glided out of the chamber... heading towards the entrance 
where the Megatron clone was.


Shaking her head as she barely caught sight of Waspinator flying out & taking 
on the brunt of Megatron's cannon blast.... 

Striding out through the doors with great confidence, glancing briefly at 
Perceptor as she passed by him. Then returned her crimson optics to gaze upon the 
haunting fiure of Megatron. Her core twisted... feeling as though her 
loyalties were going to be tested terribly. Ever so loyal to Megatron... but if there 
were 2 of them, how could she be loyal to both? 

Remaining bold & confident, she spoke in a likewise voice, "Rather bold of 
you to return to us after all this time!" 

That fembot, feline form... slender, attractive for one of her stature... 
white with black stripes in some places... a mix of metal & organic... a pair of 
wings from her back... making her appear likened to an angel. 

She awaited Megatron's response. 

--part1_a9.586e9c34.2de2f7e0_boundary
